title: Vandhen Vandhen Lyrics Panchathantiram
stanzas: <div>Vandhen Vandhen Lyrics Panchathantiram

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen
vairam paaintha
nenjam thaedi Â vandhen
enathu kanavu kanavai
eduthu chella vandhen

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen

yaarodi vaayadi kalliye
villiye thalli podi
raamanin maithili naanthaandi
pombala pokiri odi podi
un aasaiki
aathi seshan theduthodi

pandhiyila pandhikitta
vittu tharuven
yen mundhiyila pangukaetta
vetti puduven

adi kandavalum
vandhu kaiya vekka
avar corporation pump alla

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen
enathu kanavu kanavai
eduthu chella vandhen

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen

pesaadhe pesaathe
yesaathe yesaathe

konjam azhagaaga
yaendhaan pirandheno
podhum naan patta paadu

vengai oru pakkam
singam maru pakkam
naduvil naanthaandi aadu

ada yen jeevan ponaalum
un karpai naan kaapen
siri konjam sriraama

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen
enathu kanavu kanavai
eduthu chella vandhen

vaayendi aadendi
muttithaan paakalaam vaariyaadi
un muttithaan
paendhudum oadipodi

naan pacha kili
nee vettukili
potti enna di
unna aati veppen
peyum otti veppen
enthan sriraaman mael aanai

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vanth..

enakku enakku
nee sari sama gama
thathikridithom thathakridithom
hey enakku neeya
unakku naana
ondi ondi paathukalaama
paadendi
jathi podendi

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen
readyaa

vaayaadi enakku
samamaadi

vandhen vandhen
meendum naane vandhen
